languages.text: After the first incoming attack each enemy performs during this creature's turn within a 1-cell radius, they perform a strike against that enemy in response.
languages.original_text: Это существо отвечает на первую атаку в радиусе 1 клетки, которую совершает каждый противник в ход этого существа.

traits.locale_text: Responds to all incoming attacks within a 1-cell radius.
After the first incoming attack each enemy performs during this creature's turn within a 1-cell radius, they perform a strike against that enemy in response.

languages.text: 此生物在自己的回合内遭到距离1格的敌人攻击时，会立刻进行反击，此效果每回合可以对每位敌人触发一次。
languages.original_text: After the first incoming attack each enemy performs during this creature's turn within a 1-cell radius, they perform a strike against that enemy in response.

traits.locale_text: 此生物在自己的回合内遭到距离1格的敌人攻击时，会立刻进行反击，此效果每回合可以对每位敌人触发一次。

languages.text: Tras el primer ataque recibido que realiza cada enemigo durante el turno de esta criatura en un radio de 1 casilla, golpea a ese enemigo a modo de respuesta.
languages.original_text: After the first incoming attack each enemy performs during this creature's turn within a 1-cell radius, they perform a strike against that enemy in response.

traits.locale_text: Tras el primer ataque recibido que realiza cada enemigo durante el turno de esta criatura en un radio de 1 casilla, golpea a ese enemigo a modo de respuesta.

languages.text: この生物のターン中、各敵が半径1セル以内に最初の攻撃を行った後、その敵に対して攻撃を行う。
languages.original_text: After the first incoming attack each enemy performs during this creature's turn within a 1-cell radius, they perform a strike against that enemy in response.

traits.locale_text: この生物のターン中、各敵が半径1セル以内に最初の攻撃を行った後、その敵に対して攻撃を行う。

languages.text: Это существо отвечает на первую атаку в радиусе 1 клетки, которую совершает каждый противник в ход этого существа.
languages.original_text: After the first incoming attack each enemy performs during this creature's turn within a 1-cell radius, they perform a strike against that enemy in response.

traits.locale_text: Персонаж отвечает на все атаки в радиусе 1 клетки.
Персонаж отвечает на все атаки в радиусе 1 клетки.

languages.text: Nach dem ersten Angriff eines jeden Feindes während des Zugs dieser Kreatur in einem Radius von 1 Feld führt die Kreatur als Reaktion selbst einen Angriff gegen den jeweiligen Feind aus.
languages.original_text: After the first incoming attack each enemy performs during this creature's turn within a 1-cell radius, they perform a strike against that enemy in response.

traits.locale_text: Nach dem ersten Angriff eines jeden Feindes während des Zugs dieser Kreatur in einem Radius von 1 Feld führt die Kreatur als Reaktion selbst einen Angriff gegen den jeweiligen Feind aus.

languages.text: Cette créature riposte contre la première attaque lancée par chaque ennemi lors de son tour dans un rayon de 1 case.
languages.original_text: After the first incoming attack each enemy performs during this creature's turn within a 1-cell radius, they perform a strike against that enemy in response.

traits.locale_text: Cette créature riposte contre la première attaque lancée par chaque ennemi lors de son tour dans un rayon de 1 case.

languages.text: Responds once to all incoming attacks within a 1-cell radius.

languages.text: Bu yaratığın turunda 1 hücrelik yarıçap içindeki her düşmanın gerçekleştirdiği ilk saldırının ardından bu yaratık da o düşmana bir karşı saldırı gerçekleştirir.
